paragraph.paragraph:
The EiffelCOM library includes the following clusters:
A
../reference/constants/index.html Constants cluster provides standard COM contants and enumerations.
A
01_interfaces.html Interfaces cluster includes wrappers for standard interfaces that the EiffelCOM wizard does not generate and deferred classes:
../reference/interfaces/ecom_interface.html ECOM_INTERFACE ,
../reference/interfaces/ecom_queriable.html ECOM_QUERIABLE , and
../reference/interfaces/ecom_stub.html ECOM_STUB .
A
02_structures.html Structures cluster includes wrappers for COM structures and additional data structures.
A
../reference/support/index.html Support cluster provides access to helper classes.
See Also:
/technologies/com/index.html The Component Object Model
../../../tools/wizards/com/index.html EiffelCOM wizard
